subject: Zombie Time on Z-Nation
event: As some of you may well know our grand friend and one of the producer/writers of Z-nation, The Marvelous Mister Mike Cassutt (He's also writing for Captain Cosmos and HBO), talked us into being Zombies for his show while we were at WorldCon in Spokane this year. What fun! Don't miss GRRMs most interesting singing to date, featured on Season 2 of Z-Nation. Now Showing every Friday at 10/9c on the SyFy Channel. Here's a fun Picture of GRRM and some of us crazy Minions really getting into character before filming. This Message was brought to you by the Minions of Fevre River. RRrrrrrrAAAAAaaaaaRRRRRRRRrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrRRRRRRrrrrrraaAAAaH!

comments.article: Very good image. You look great zombie . you is really enjoying yourself out of dead lol
comments.subject: Very funny

comments.upictitle: Jimmy Hollaman and GUS: Uncle Duke
comments.article: I don't know which is more fun. You as a zombie or you being eaten by a shark. lol. Looks like you are having fun
What does zombie GRRMartin sing before he feasts? The BRAAAAAAAAAINS of Castamere.
comments.subject: A riddle

comments.article: You have just made my day. Precious pun. Mind if I use it? :D
comments.subject: Re: A riddle

comments.article: Glad you appear to be having fun on set. I've heard of Z-Nation but I've mostly heard negative things about it, so I'm not sure if I should give it a shot or not.
comments.subject: Looks like fun!

comments.article: Z-NATION is a lot of fun... so long as you don't take zombies too seriously.
comments.subject: Re: Looks like fun!

comments.article: You are a seriously convincing dead guy in that last photo(that's a high compliment coming from me-I'm a mortician and see a lot of dead people). Looking forward to seeing the show. <3 and BRAAAIINZ!
I'm guessing our post-apocalyptic skies here in Spokane helped you get in the mood for this. Thankfully, the air is much better now...

I think Raya meant "signing," not "singing."

I only sing when I am very, very drunk.

...whem signing works no more? ;)
Looking great there in dead, just maybe don't make it a habit!
Glad to see the shark didn't eat all of you. Maybe you should have signed with GeoRrrrge RrrrrrRrrrr Maaaarrrrtin.

Can't wait to see grrm act. That too as a zombie! How long did it take to get that makeup George?
An afterthought :The women in the pics reminded me of lady Stoneheart. Which reminds me that Stoneheart was not included in the television show.
*sigh of exasperation*
comments.subject: The Ladies

comments.article: looks great, I love Z-nation! Which episode are you in? :)
This is what happens when you don't burn the bodies!

It shouldn't have been "RRrrrrrrAAAAAaaaaaRRRRRRRRrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrRRRRRRrrrrrraaAAAaH!"
It should have been "BBrrrrrrAAAAAaaaaaIIIIIIIInnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnNNNNNNnnnnnnssSSSsH!"
Zombie is coming.

My boulders (<----) are Zombie blockers.

What fun. You look guys look great. :)
comments.subject: Can't get me...

comments.article:
That make-up job is so awesome.

At least, I hope it's make-up.
What episode will you be in?
Awesome ! I love that show !
Please god, let there be no scenes in this episode that pay homage to MEATHOUSE MAN.
Happy name day George! You make a great zombie :)

Dear GRRM, happy birthday to you! :)

Russia remember.
Happy Birthday George. Wish you all the best! :)
comments.subject: Happy 67th Birthday!

comments.article: Completely unrelated to the post, but relevant to today's date: I hope you have a wonderful nameday, sir! All the best wishes from sunny Poland! :)
comments.subject: Happy Nameday!

comments.article: Happy Nameday, but Winter is Coming!!!!
comments.subject: Happy Nameday!!!!

comments.article: Happy birthday!
